name: BABA BHAGWAN DASS EDUCATION SOCIETY
briefDescription: To enlarge the scope of Vocational and Professional opportunities, income    generation and gainful occupations. To adopt an area intensive approach to integrate the existing efforts to provide    Formal and Non-formal schooling, Adult education and upgradation of education    Through condensed courses and vocational trainings. Mobilizing women in small viable groups and making facilities available through    training and access to credit. Enabling groups of women to take up employment-cum-income generation     programmers' of their own. To provide emotional support and counseling to such women's.
